author: Joshua Caplan, Joshua Caplan
title: Police: Connecticut Doctor Arrested After Coughing on Medical Staff on Purpose
description: Dr. Cory Edgar, a physician at UConn Health, was arrested Thursday after police alleged he intentionally coughed on other medical employees.
content:
Dr. Cory Edgar, a physician at UConn Health, was arrested Thursday after police alleged he intentionally coughed on other medical employees.
UConn police said Edgar was deliberately coughing on and hugging nurses, causing them a substantial amount of alarm. … [+955 chars]
